messages.title: Scottish Conservative & Unionist
messages.content: The Conservatives are working hard to make sure Scotland - and Britain - stay on the right track.

messages.title: A Personal Message from Ruth Davidson MSP
messages.content: The truth is that if you want to keep the ates down and hold Nicola Sturgeon and the SNP to account, I need you to vot Conservative here.
